translation: If the splendour of a thousand suns were to blaze out simultaneously in the sky, that would be the splendour of that mighty being.
commentary: 11.12 Divi in the sky? Suryasahasrasya of a thousand suns? Should be were? Yugapat at once (simultaneously)? Risen arisen? If if? Bhah splendour? Similar like? She that? would be would be? Bhasa: splendour? his of that? Mahatmanah of the mighty Being (great soul).Commentary Divi here means in the Antariksha or the sky.Mahatma here refers to the great Soul or the mighty Being? the Cosmic Form.
